item.title: Making a npc say something not working
item.dc:creator: @treston323 treston323
item.description:
@treston323 wrote:

i put a npc somewhere that never had a text thing to say so i added this

if(misc.random(50) == 2026) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “treston’s crib owns”;
}
and its at the place where i want it but its not saying anything. anyone know the problem
